p: The results of DPPH scavenging and pancreatic lipase inhibition are given in Table 2. The results indicated that 60% ethanolic extract exhibited lowest IC 50 value for DPPH scavenging which differed slightly from IC 50 value for 80% ethanolic extract. However, this difference of activity was statistically significant ( p < 0.05). The antioxidant potential possessed by plant extracts was most probably due to presence of polyphenols which exerted their reducing impact on DPPH free radical.
